title: MangoQuest
author: Maruend
txt_content:

replies.author: 酥宁最酥啦
replies.txt_content:
plugins/MangoQuest/config.yml
#【是否啟用記分板系統】
enableScoreboard: true
改为
enableScoreboard: false即可关闭

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
在mangoquest的config.yml里面
把
enableScoreboard设为false可以关掉mangoquest的计分板系统
